alert.note: Alert for Smyth; Tazewell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 4:30AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Ashe and Watauga Counties. In Virginia, Tazewell, Smyth and Grayson Counties. In West Virginia, Mercer, Summers and Western Greenbrier Counties. * WHEN...Through to 7 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As the ground becomes saturated from the rain, it will be easier to topple trees.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
